channel.title: Bujo on Rock Foxes
channel.description: Recent content in Bujo on Rock Foxes

item.title: Why should you start a Bullet Journal?
item.description: I don’t use this phrase lightly, so I mean it when I say: the bullet journal changed my life. As someone with a ton of to-do’s, multiple calendars/jobs, and limited free time, bullet journaling has kept me focused and organized during my busiest times. And if something does slip through the cracks, it’s usually when I was slacking on updating my journal. There are a ton of ways to organize a bullet journal.
